message.content:
cs.CV, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.CL 

Reasoning: 
- cs.CV (Computer Vision) is the most likely category as the paper is about text detection in natural scene images using heatmaps, which is a common topic in computer vision research. 
- cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) is also likely as the paper proposes a new framework for text detection that utilizes deep learning techniques. 
- cs.LG (Machine Learning) is another possible category as the paper involves training a deep learning model to detect text regions in images. 
- cs.IR (Information Retrieval) is a less likely category, but still possible as the paper discusses the practicality of the proposed framework for real-world applications. 
- cs.CL (Computation and Language) is also a less likely category, but still possible as the paper combines text detection and recognition to form a text spotting system, which involves natural language processing techniques.
